review: Bought them used. Work just like new. Lots of apps available (the almost-teenager LOVES that). Easiest remote on the planet. The voice-recognition is out of this world. Even if she's half-asleep or has a mouthful of food (I DID mention she's a heathen/almost-teenager, right?) it STILL understands her perfectly. Even when I can't. Plus the convenience of the Netflix app right there, and there's so much available on Prime...

review: I'm saving money not using cable anymore. I bought a Mohu antenna for eachTV so we can pickup the local channels and Amazon Fire TV does a great job of getting meto Netflix, Hulu, Amazon and so many additional options, some of which have a costbut many of which are FREE.  I love it. NO MORE FEES GOING FORWARD. Thatmeans I can invest it, save it, spend it or give it away!The point is, I get to choose what I pay for. With cable or satellite, I have to pay fora package, maybe get locked into a contract AND I don't get to choose what is inthe package so I am paying for things I don't want and the cost is simply, way too much!Thank you Amazon!
